goal.en: The purpose of this course is to equip students with foundational knowledge in Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning (ML), and AI-based modeling capabilities. The overall objective of the course is to enable students to possess basic competencies in AI and ML, data application skills, and a certain degree of foresight into the future. The instructional topics will include neural network models and machine learning, fuzzy sets and fuzzy inference models, metaheuristics for machine learning, derivative-based machine learning methods, concepts and knowledge related to optimal solutions, and information applications based on machine learning, and more
goal.ch: 本課程之目的在讓學生具備人工智慧(Artificial Intelligence, AI) 和機器學習(Machine Learning, ML)及以AI為基礎的建模能力(AI based modeling )的基礎系統知識。整個課程之目標: 使學生具有對AI和ML基本能力，數據應用能力、及一定程度的未來洞察力。教學主題將包括類神經網絡模型與機器學習、模糊集與模糊推論模型、元啟發式機器學習方法(Metaheuristics for machine learning)、導數型機器學習方法、最佳解的相關概念與知識、基於機器學習的資訊應用等等。

content.en:
Lecture Topics:
(1) Introduction to the course
(2) Neural Network Models
(3) Fuzzy Sets and Fuzzy Inference Models
(4) Performance Learning and Optima
(5) Metaheuristic Methods for Machine Learning (part-1)
(6) Metaheuristic Methods for Machine Learning (part-2)
(7) Data Clustering Methods for Machine Learning
(8) Derivative-Based Methods for Machine Learning (part-1)
(9) Derivative-Based Methods for Machine Learning (part-2) [optional]
10) Advanced Topics [optional]
{such as Inner Product Space, Least Squares, Hybrid Machine Learning, Neuro-Fuzzy, Practical Issues for Machine Learning, and more}
content.ch:
授課內容:
(1) 課程介紹 Introduction to the course
(2) 類神經網路模型 Neural Network Models
(3) 模糊集與模糊推論模型 Fuzzy Sets and Fuzzy Inference Models
(4) 效能學習與最佳值 Performance Learning and Optima
(5) 元啟發式機器學習演算法(part-1) Metaheuristic Methods for Machine Learning (part-1)
(6) 元啟發式機器學習演算法(part-2) Metaheuristic Methods for Machine Learning (part-2)
(7) 分群演算法 Data Clustering Methods for Machine Learning
(8) 導數型機器學習演算法(part-1) Derivative-Based Methods for Machine Learning (part-1)
(9) 導數型機器學習演算法(part-2) Derivative-Based Methods for Machine Learning (part-2) [optional]
10) Advanced Topics [optional]
{such as Inner Product Space, Least Squares, Hybrid Machine Learning, Neuro-Fuzzy, Practical Issues for Machine Learning, and more}

textbook.en: Textbook: None. Reference books: (1) S. Russell and P. Norvig, Artificial Intelligence – A Modern Approach, 3rd ed., Pearson Education, NJ, USA, 2010. (2) Deep Learning, by Ian Goodfellow and Yoshua Bengio and Aaron Courville, the MIT Press, 2016. (3) J.-S. R. Jang, C.-T. Sun, and E. Mizutani, Neuro-Fuzzy and Soft Computing, PEARSON, 2004. (4) Gareth Williams, Linear Algebra with Applications, 9th Ed., Jones ＆ Bartlett Learning, Burlington, MA, USA, 2017.

grading.en: Grading policy: 1) Class Participation: 12％, 2) Homework Assignments: 60％, 3) Midterm Evaluation: 13％, 4) Final Evaluation: 15％. --------------- 5) An optional bonus -- Term Project Research: 15％. (Free choice to participate) --------------- 6) If the semester score is greater than 99, it will be 99 finally.
grading.ch: 評量配分比重: 1) Class Participation (出席與課堂參與討論): 12％, 2) Homework Assignments (作業): 60％, 3) Midterm Evaluation (期中評量): 13％, 4) Final Evaluation (期末評量): 15％. --------------- 5) 加分選項:學期專題(Term Project Research): 15％. (自由選擇參與) --------------- 6) 若學期成績大於 99 分，以 99 分計算。
